title: China-Maldives Free Trade Agreement takes effect from January 1 in a 'significant milestone'
description: China-Maldives Free Trade Agreement takes effect from January 1 in a 'significant milestone' The CMFTA, signed in 2014 and approved by the Maldivian Parliament in 2017, was suspended after a regime change in 2018. Its progress gained momentum following President Mohamed Muizzu's official visit to Ch...
